headline: After Plunging 15.4% in 4 Weeks, Here's Why the Trend Might Reverse for Gartner (IT)
summary: The heavy selling pressure might have exhausted for Gartner (IT) as it is technically in oversold territory now. In addition to this technical measure, strong agreement among Wall Street analysts in revising earnings estimates higher indicates that the stock is ripe for a trend reversal.

In addition to this technical measure, strong agreement among Wall Street analysts in revising earnings estimates higher indicates that the stock is ripe for a trend reversal.

headline: Gartner (IT) Experienced Modest Declined in Q2 Amid Government Spending Cuts
summary: Baron Funds, an investment management company, released its “Baron Asset Fund” second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. U.S. stocks rose amid volatility caused by tariff policies and Middle East tensions. Early April risk-off sentiment was fueled by Trump’s “Liberation Day” tariffs, seen as more severe than expected. headline: ClearBridge Mid Cap Growth Portfolios Q2 2025 Commentary
summary: Franklin Templeton reports strong Q2 gains for its Mid Cap Growth Portfolios, powered by AI-driven picks. Explore how active strategy shaped the rebound.
